Articles.Content:
Just talk about the current Supermoon Eclipse!

I have a supermoon going on right now, perfect view of the brightness of it over here in the UK, and I think I saw the ISS overhead, a kind of flashing light that looks like it's moving, slowly.

Won't be seeing the eclipse though as where I am it won't be until 1 in the morning. >.<
There is a thread already here

There is a thread already here

no matter. there are like 5 Mars threads right now

no matter. there are like 5 Mars threads right now

Yes matter, please keep the same subject in the same thread. Mars is a broad thing, this eclipse not so much

Just had a nice gander outside in the pitch black with my kiss*** dog and my dads headlight, very refreshing, actually, saw a bunch of stars, the moon again, what was either a cloud that looked like the milky way or the milky way, two massive harvestman (them creepy almost-spiders) and a dead mouse.

Indeed, opening multiple unwarranted threads on a same subject is a form of spam (and community rule 2.3.a applies in these cases). Also, it steers away from an already opened thread, fragmenting discussion.

Please keep discussion on the first-opened thread on the subject. This one deserves closure.
